posts.post_content: Been awhile since my last attempt so I will give it another shot.  I'm still looking for the final two cards to complete my T207 set.  I'm willing to buy for an even semi-reasonable price (yes, I know there has been a PSA 2 McCarthy on ebay for the past year for 3-4x the market value...not quite that desperate...yet) and I have a bunch of high quality trade material as well.  I would consider any condition, even a total beater.  These two shouldn't be this tough...but...you know those T207's.  Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] if you have either of these available.  Thanks for looking!

I believe I have a PDA 4 or 5 Birmingham.  I will confirm and let you know for sure this evening.  Are you willing to just pay SMR?  
Thanks,
Cory

Hi Cory,
Thanks for the response.  I don't really follow the SMR pricing but I am very familiar with the market values on the T207 set and am certainly willing to pay a reasonable price for the card.  Please send scans and an asking price to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] if interested.  Thanks again!

Still looking for both of these cards.  I know there were a couple that were part of large lots in the recent REA auction, so if the winning bidder is looking to turn those around quickly, I'm your man.  I have plenty of quality trade bait and am willing to buy for any reasonable price as well.  Thanks!
